DateTimeFromWeek (FUN)
DateTimeFromWeek (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION DateTimeFromWeek : ULINT
Combines the ISO week date parts to a timestamp
uiYear
:=
2009
uiWeek
:=1
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.MONDAY
=>
29.12.2008
uiYear
:=
2009
uiWeek
:=53
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.SUNDAY
=>
03.01.2010
See:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
DateTimeFromWeek
ULINT
date and time in milliseconds since 1.1.1970 00:00:00.000
